Welcome to pyOPERA's documentation!
===================================
**PyOPERA** (/py'opera/) is a Python wrapper around the library generated by the NIEHS OPERA project.  It pulls the base python library from `OPERA <https://github.com/niehs/opera/>`_ and offers a *simple* and
*intuitive* API.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

   :caption: Contents:
